name: LOC - The Surgical Strike
description: LOC - The Surgical Strike gives you a spine-chilling experience of a life of a commando in the POK region. The mesmerizing terrain with beautiful landscapes and tranquil river disguise the terrorizing camps! Packed with AAA Graphics, HD sounds, Advanced VFX and quality AI, this real life simulation of terrains and the camps thrills the player to the core with the desire to decimate the terrorists. This surgical strike is a game that cannot be missed by a true gamer who loves his/her nation and enjoys the thrill of serving it. Do you have it in  you???
